text: Hagi anantetira Filistia sondia vahe'mo'zama Ra Anumzamofo agonare Gibeama kuma eme ante'za mani'nare vugahane. Hagi ana kumapima ufrenunka mago'a kasnampa vahezaga agonaregati ne-eza zamagra zamazampina laire nehaza zavenane hapue nehaza zavenane, nase'nasepane, konkene, eri'ne'za ahe'za ne-eza kasanampa kea hu'za ne-esaza vahe ome tutagiha huzmantegahane.
